questions.question: What to you is the most beautiful idea, maybe the most surprising mysterious idea in physics?
Do you think we humans will tend to figure out how to not blow ourselves up?
One, can you maybe describe what is string theory, and two, what are the open challenges?
Let me ask, why do you think Einstein never got the Nobel Prize for general relativity?
Is there a day in your life you could relive because it made you truly happy?
